HealthcarePersonnelType

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/terminology/codesystem/cdcnhsn.html
    Code Display
    2366-3 Employees (staff on facility payroll)
    2367-1 Licensed independent practitioners: physicians, advanced practice nurses, and physician assistants
    2368-9 Adult students or trainees and volunteers
    2369-7 Other contract personnel
